entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule

[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9541] Schulden with a value of 11,518,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Liabilities and Noncurrent Liabilites ( 2,135,000,000 + 4,129,000,000 ) with a value of 6,264,000,000.
These values should be equal. The properties of this ifrs-full:Liabilities fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Liabilities : -6 Decimals of Current Liabilities : -6 Decimals of Non Current Liabilities : -6
Rule Element Id:9541 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/3912005AWHKLQ1CPLV11/2020-12-31/ESEF/DE/0/covestroag-2020-12-31.zip/covestroag-2020-12-31/reports/covestroag-2020-12-31.xhtml 10411

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 1,489,000,000 reported in the network role http://covestroag.com/xbrl/2020/roles/Bilanz should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 209,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://covestroag.com/xbrl/2020/roles/Eigenkapitalveraenderungsrechnung. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of OtherReserves : -6 Decimals of Equity : -6 Rule version: 17.0.0 - https://filings.xbrl.org/3912005AWHKLQ1CPLV11/2020-12-31/ESEF/DE/0/covestroag-2020-12-31.zip/covestroag-2020-12-31/reports/covestroag-2020-12-31.xhtml 10411
